Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are followed by Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are not dismissed
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' does not happen

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are preceded by Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR from all Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR by STAFF MEMBER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR grouped by org:resource
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are rejected
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in relation to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR over Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of variants containing both Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurring in variants with budget owner approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR performed by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in domestic declaration cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases with same budget owner and supervisor
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities == 'BUDGET OWNER' where ma is the last value of org:role

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are followed by director approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and final decision
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in pre-paid travel cost cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR performed per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities
